full_summary:
### Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
## Solicitation Number: 23-58065
### Section 1 - Proposal Information

#### Contract Description:

A contract for the procurement of a Hydraulic Servo Testing Machine with Grooved Table.

#### Solicitation Type:

Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

#### Solicitation Status:

Closed (expired)

#### Contact Information:

- Name: R-Michel Simard, Senior Procurement Officer
- Email: R-Michel.Simard@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca
- Telephone: 418-550-4888
- Address: 501 University Blvd East, Saguenay, QC, G7H 8C3

### Section 2 - Contract Award Information

#### Contract Award Reason:

The contract has been awarded to MTS Testing Systems (Canada) Ltd. due to the supplier's ability to meet all necessary technical requirements and specifications listed in the solicitation.

### Section 3 - Contract Value

#### Estimated Contract Value:

The value of the contract is estimated to be $261,341.37 CAD (GST/HST extra).

#### Payment Terms:

Payment terms and conditions will be negotiated and included in the contract.

### Section 4 - Performance Requirements

#### Technical Requirements:

The hydraulic servo testing machine must meet the following requirements:

* Operate at a minimum of 100 kN
* Have an axial rigidity of the frame greater than 250 kN/mm
* Have a table with a minimum thickness of 150mm, 711mm in width and 2,032mm in length, featuring T-slots in both the X and Y directions
* Include a hydraulic actuator positioned on the table, with a minimum displacement of 150 mm
* Include two hydraulic grips compatible with a variety of samples to be tested, with a maximum capacity of 100 kN
* Have a control module for the hydraulic grips with a minimum capacity of 3000 psi
* Include a water-cooling system and a electric power and control cables

### Section 5 - Statements of Capabilities

#### Interested Suppliers:

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods, services, or construction services described in the ACAN may submit a statement of capabilities to R-Michel Simard at the contact information listed above.
